title: Quarkus extensions for Azure services

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

This repository will host Quarkus extensions for different Azure services, e.g.:
- [Key Vault](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/key-vault/)
- [App Configuration](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-app-configuration/overview)
- [Cosmos DB](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/introduction)
- [Blob storage](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/storage/blobs/storage-blobs-introduction)
- [Service Bus](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/service-bus-messaging/service-bus-messaging-overview)
- [Event Hubs](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/event-hubs/event-hubs-about)
- ...

### Repository name

quarkus-azure-services

### Short description

Quarkus extensions for Azure services

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-azure-services/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- quarkus
- azure


### Team Members

- m-reza-rahman
- edburns
- majguo
- zhengchang907
- galiacheng
